pokeball.name: Poké Ball
pokeball.description: A ball thrown at wild Pokémon to catch them.

pokeball.name: Great Ball
pokeball.description: A ball for catching wild Pokémon. More effective than a Poké Ball.

pokeball.name: Ultra Ball
pokeball.description: A ball for catching wild Pokémon. More effective than a Great Ball.

pokeball.name: Master Ball
pokeball.description: A ball that captures any wild Pokémon without fail.
